climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: The unique wave design guides your hands into the best position and conforms naturally to your fingers. Easy comfortable whisper-quiet typing without a learning curve.
A large cushioned palm rest helps position your hands properly on the keyboard and offers a comfortable place to rest them when not typing.
Right-handed comfort mouse with generous contoured design soft rubber grips and an advanced scroll wheel for hyper-fast or click-to-click scrolling.
Your computer at your fingertips. Get instant access to your music, calculator, email and more with media control keys and 18 programmable keys.
The MK570 includes the K350 Wireless Keyboard and the M705 Wireless Mouse
body.description: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo with a wave keyboard design for more comfortable typing without any learning curve.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MK570 Comfort Wave Wireless Combo Curve Appeal With an ergonomic Comfort Wave design and sculpted laser-grade mouse, this wireless combo cradles your hands in comfort to help minimize hand and wrist strain—even after spending all day at your computer.

Wave-Shaped Key Frame Your fingers vary in length. So with its gradual wave-shaped contour, this keyboard supports the actual, varied lengths of your fingers. Comfortable High-Performance Mouse Sculpted comfort shape with advanced features like hyper-fast + precision scrolling, customizable buttons and accurate laser-grade tracking on virtually any surface. Contoured Cushioned Palm Rest The palm rest helps position your hands comfortably on the keyboard—and offers a comfortable place to rest your palms when you’re not typing. Power-Packed With extra-long battery life of up to three years*, you may forget that your keyboard and mouse even need batteries. Advanced Wireless Connection One tiny Logitech Unifying Receiver connects both the keyboard and mouse to your laptop with reliable, long-range wireless technology and secure 128-bit AES encryption. Adjustable Keyboard Height Three options for leg height allow you to adjust the keyboard to the height that feels most comfortable to you.
System Requirements Windows 10 or later, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XPUSB portInternet connection (for optional software download)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard & mouse combo was very easy to plug & play with my PC Laptop. Both are very comfortable to use, although the keyboard takes just a little getting used to if you're accustomed to a standard keyboard. The only thing I miss from my previous keyboard (also Logitech, different model) is the Caps Lock light that it had and this one does not. I use these for CAD drafting and often toggle the caps lock for text. But otherwise give it an A+.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It fits on my keyboard stand and feels ergonomic. Comfortable keys when typing. Has my necessary 9-key pad. What more can I say?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What A Difference This Keyboard Makes!
reviews.reviewText: I never thought much about my keyboard so my last one lasted about 10 years. Every so often I had to shake it upside down with dust and crumbs. It finally died and I decided to get one that was more comfortable for my wrists. I knew enough people suffering from carpel tunnel syndrome, and I didn't want to risk it.This one came with equal good and bad comments, but I decided to give it a shot. I couldn't believe the difference from my last one. My wrists now lay comfortably on the bottom of the keyboard while I'm typing, and it's much more comfortable. Even the mouse is a great change. I was so used to scrolling slowly from my last mouse, but this one allows to speed through those sites that have so much junk ads to get through. This just speeds you through that stuff to where you want to go.I presets are great to where you can adjust your computer volume. I know there are plenty that do this, but I had my last keyboard for a decade so many things have changed, and it's still very exciting. Some have complained that the keys feel cheap, but I don't understand that part at all. Everything on the keyboard feels very sturdy, and I've had this one for nearly six months now with no issues at all.The mouse fits comfortable in your hand with side clicks so you can move page to page rather than scrolling. If you don't think keyboards are different, you need to try this puppy out and you will see (and feel) the difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I think I got shipped a renewed one. Also, the mouse is not as good as it used to be.
reviews.reviewText: You can see in the pics that the box was all beat up, retaped, and they clearly cut what was probably the return shipping labels from it. I ordered it new, so I'm kind of upset I paid the new price, but that didn't affect the rating.The keyboard itself is pretty nice. Wrist pad is better than none, feels ergonomic, the 'wave' doesn't take that long to get used to, buttons have a nice snap to them (just the right amount of 'click' for me); Definitely an upgrade from my stock keyboard.The mouse (the M705), on the other hand, is one I already had, but as you can see from the pic, they have since reworked it to be cheaper. No color on the battery cover, arrow buttons, or scroll button (Not a big deal). Switch feels worse (harder to press), which stinks because I turn it on/off all the time. The optical sensor no longer says performance, so I don't know if they actually changed that (I don't do anything precise enough to tell). Lastly, the bottom nubs are just regular plastic, which does make it feel different on my mouse pad compared to my old one. Maybe it's mostly cosmetic, but just wanted to let people know in case they specifically wanted a replacement for their old M705.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely nice keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I don't type for a living but I've had this keyboard and mouse combo for 10 minutes and it's like driving a Cadillac.As far as my Windows 11 machine goes, it's incredibly easy to install - It very nearly installs itself.It's a bit more compact than my old piece of junk so that will take some getting used to but, I like the fact that I freed up my USB ports by connecting it via a flawless Bluetooth connection.I gave it 5 stars just for being so smooth and incredibly nice to use right out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, quiet, low profile
reviews.reviewText: Definitely like this keyboard. It is comfortable to type on (same for three mouse as well). It is quiet that you can type while on a video call. It is smaller than the older version that it can fit on my small desk well. The lack of a print screen button is a little inconvenient, but you can program other function key to do that on your os or apps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great keyboard and mouse
reviews.reviewText: I was interested in replacing my flat keyboard as I was finding it too small to type on. I saw a Microsoft keyboard at a store and it was out of stock, both there and on their website. So I purchased this keyboarded and mouse combination, and it's terrific.When they say ergonomic, they mean it. This is quite possibly the best keyboard and mouse I've ever had. The action on both the keyboard and mouse are fantastic and smooth. I find myself actually looking forward to using it. Nicely done Logitech.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quiet and easy to type on
reviews.reviewText: I just got this keyboard and mouse set. I really enjoy typing on this keyboard. It is very comfortable and the typing is much quieter than my old keyboard. I find that my typing accuracy is also much improved with this keyboard. The mouse that comes with the keyboard is very quiet when clicking. Overall so far I am really enjoying this set and would highly recommend to anyone who likes to have good hand comfort when working on the computer!
I had an earlier model of the same keyboard that lasted me 10 years. This one is a newer model number but the same type of keyboard. Very comfortable to use. I recommend it for long life.

The keyboard and mouse have good build quality. The keyboard features a leather armrest and an ergonomic design. In the US, this combo is priced around $65 (₹5.5k), but here in India, it costs ₹15k, which is significantly overpriced. I purchased this based on my employer's recommendation. Overall, everything about this combo is good, especially for work, as I'm in customer support. However, the price is quite high for the Indian market.

Keep in mind that "Easy-Switch" only works for the keyboard and NOT the mouse. So if you wanna seamlessly transition between your desktop and Ipad, you will work for keyboard only. It's idiotic. I don't know why they would bundle the two together. Other than that, keyboard has a nice small form factor. Mouse must be some trash they had laying around in the shop. Clicks are mushy. 4000 dpi is meh if you are used to gaming mice.

I love the wave keyboard - makes typing so much easier.I know some people had problems with the mouse but I am happy to say once I contacted Logitech to get the missing piece of software everything works great.I been using Logitech for years & am extremely happy with this product.
